rules_text:
[i]Plan Ahead[/i] – Instant and sorcery spells you cast cost {1} less to cast.
[i]Fire Breath[/i] – Whenever you cast a noncreature spell, Ena, Red Tactician deals 2 damage to each opponent.
[i]Strategic Planning[/i] – {1}{U}{R}: Look at the top two cards of your library. Put one of them into your hand and the other on the bottom of your library.
